data.text:
RT @MarlowNYC Kristen Stewart: 
Reality: http://t.co/SWqGojBUOL …
Demented right-wing fantasy: http://t.co/kPQJjBJ5LG
@srbryson It's a fictional character. A. Fictional. Character. Do you believe in the First Amendment? It doesn't sound like it.
@srbryson So any portrayal of a conflicted member of the military in a fictional film is "perpetuating stereotypes?" How silly you sound.
@srbryson She is talking about a character in a movie... how is this not registering?
@srbryson Nobody is saying that about you, least of all me. My grandfather was a WWII vet.
@srbryson Nope. I read it. I understood it. I didn't twist it to fit my agenda. Wish you were capable of doing the same.
@srbryson You know movies aren't real, right? And when you speak about the motivations of a character in a film, that isn't real life?
@srbryson Huh? You might need a little help processing info then. She's talking about a character in a movie.
@MarlowNYC thanks for calling out @FoxNews , please set this woman  @KelliSerio & @GossipCop straight. They also twisted the interview.

Thank you !! RT @MarlowNYC: Kristen Stewart: 

Reality: http://t.co/eMcidDz3oZ

Demented right-wing fantasy: http://t.co/QPrqbM11tZ”
